cab.content: ary Secret.This Document is the pk^;^H)8 RH'-^vv.-. Malesty'8 Governma' ..173/'Yom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of Stale for India,- (721 A ay ad 1911).(Received at India Office 1) pan.)10649. 6th August, No. 87.Part J. (1) Reports from Jalalabad and Dakka indicate more general anticipation in Ningrahar that peace will be concluded. Tribal gatherings are reported to have practically dispersed.(2) Waziri laslikar estimated 1,000 strong reported to have left Wana, moving towards Murtaza. The Waziris lashkars have not yet returned from Zhob.(3) A lashkar reported at (? Cliamozai), midway Saudeman and Lakaband. This appears to be portion of main Fort Sandeman lashkar. No other change in Zob.Part^-Nil.All. communicated to Press.
